import React, { Component, useState } from 'react'; export default class Task extends Component { render() { const collectData = async (e) =>{ try { e.preventDefault(); var result = await fetch('http://localhost:8080/', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify({tilte, subtilte, image, description, dateP, dateE}), header: {'content-Type' : 'application/json'} }) result = await result.json; localStorage.setItem("Task", JSON.stringify(result)); } catch(error) { } } return (
setImage(e.target.value)} />
setTitle(e.target.value)}/>
setSubtitle(e.target.value)} />
